Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client

Class AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.testing.client.AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest
  • public abstract class AbstractHalResourceLoaderTest
extends Object
    A base class that you can extend if you are implementing your own HalResourceLoader or HttpClientSupport classes. It will run a extensive suite of tests where a WireMockServer will respond with a variety of responses, including client/server errors and corrupt responses.

      • createLoaderUnderTest

        protected abstract io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi.HalResourceLoader createLoaderUnderTest()
        Implement this to return your implementation of HalResourceLoader to be tested. If you are implementing HttpClientSupport) then use HalResourceLoader.create() to create the instance under test
        Returns:
        the instance to be tested
